education.thomas_more.degree: Bachelor of Applied Computer Science, Application Development
experience.bluecrux.summary:
Worked on the development of LOP.ai, a digital supply chain twin for multinationals.

Contributed to the creation and integration of microservices running on Kubernetes, ensuring performance, scalability, and high availability, including:
  • Develop a service to transform raw supply chain data into a format tailored for the digital twin.
  • Build an in-memory database optimized for efficient querying of the transformed data.
experience.euricom.summary: Created a web application to assess team cohesion using Patrick Lencioni's model.
experience.euricom_2.summary: Collaborated with bluecrux and Teal Partners to build their SaaS products, LOP.ai and SD Worx Buddy.
experience.kenze.summary: Created a web application to search, preview and download various types of documents.
experience.teal_partners.summary:
Worked on the development of SD Worx Buddy, a multi-country HR and payroll solution for SMEs and midmarket.

Contributed to the configuration, payroll and integration modules, including:
  • Redesign the configuration release process, enabling HR and payroll experts to continuously deploy and review legislative changes across Buddy environments.
  • Transform raw calendar data into actionable insights essential for payroll calculations and declarations.
  • Implement various German declarations for absences due to incapacity to work, including eAU, AAG, and EEL.
experience.v33.summary: Ensured the V33 brand was well represented at major DIY chain stores in Flanders.
